descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hunter's Essence is [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77510/?]GLENMORIL[/url] add-ons.
These Add-ons introduce bloodborn-esque element into skyrim.[/size]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Language
[/size]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/b]Japanese
English (machine translation) is included in readme folder.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Requirement
[/size]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/b]Skyrim
Dragonborn

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Installation
[/size][/b]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install esp and bsa into Skyrim\data.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Uni[/size][/b][b][size=3][b]nstallation
[/b][/size][/b]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enhanced Blood Spalsh
Remove files from data folder simply.

Hunter's Essence
1.Unequip all runes/covenants.
2.Clear leveled list. "Setstage zzzHERuneQuest 10"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][size=3]Add-Ons
[/size][/b]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b][u][size=3]Enhanced Blood Splash[/size][/u][/b]
Simple Model Replacer. Non-script/esp. Compatible with blood mods.
This add-on increased the scale of blood and add BloodSplash effect. 

[b][u][size=3]Hunter's Essence[/size][/u][/b]
Add Sweep and regain, rune/covenant crafting.

[size=3][u]Sweep[/u][/size]
All attacks with melee weapons hit all targets front of player. Snaek attack is not sweep.
You can learn this skill by Spell Tome "Hunter's Essence : Sweep".

[size=3][u]Regain[/u][/size]
After being hit by an enemy, you may attack your opponent to quickly refill any lost health.
You can learn this skill by Spell Tome "Hunter's Essence : Regain".

[b][size=3][u]Rune/Covenant[/u][/size][/b]
Rune has 3 types and 3 colors.

[u][size=3]Rune type [/size][/u]
() is Slot number.
1st Rune (52): offensive runes, increase attack, magic powers etc.
2nd Rune (53): defensive runes, Increase resistance, regeneration. Reduce Spell cost etc.
3rd Rune (54): Support runes, miscellaneous.

[u][size=3]Rune Colors[/size][/u]
Blue: Aedric
Red: Daedric
Yellow: Aedric and Daedric

[u][size=3]Covenant[/size][/u]
8 Aedric and 17 daedric covenants. slot number is 55.
Aedric Covenant: Equipping 3 aedric runes ehnace covenant effect.
Daedric Covenat: Equipping 3 daedric runes ehnace covenant effect.

[u][size=3]How to get Skill/Rune/Covenant
[/size][/u]1.Go to Farengar's room of dragonsreach, Whiterun.
1.Make Arcane Jelly by Soulgem melting furnace.
2.Make Runes by Rune book.
